boss_desc1: At Lucidia, we're not just creating games;
boss_desc2: we're building the future of gaming in the Middle East, where tradition meets innovation.
mission_statement: To redefine the gaming landscape in the Middle East by harnessing the power of Web3 technologies, creating unparalleled experiences for developers and players alike.
vision_content: Empowering a new era of gaming where community, creativity, and blockchain-driven economies converge to define the future of digital entertainment,Â  bringing unique, engaging experiences to the Middle Eastern community and beyond.
subscribe: Subscribe for more interesting update from Lucidia!
news_title1: A Whole New Ecosystem For Lucidia: A Complex One Where User Can Experience Gaming and Crypto
product_desc1: A specialized space for developers to collaborate, share, and innovate, deeply rooted in the rich cultural tapestry of the Middle East.
product_desc2: Dive into a treasure trove of game development resources, from unique character models to sophisticated code snippets, all tailored for the Arabic-speaking gaming community.
product_desc3: Harness the power of blockchain with our comprehensive toolkit, designed to seamlessly blend NFTs into your gaming projects.
product_desc4: Participate in our scholarship program, enabling a new dimension of community support and shared gaming experiences.
main_desc0: Lucidia leads in merging classic gaming with blockchain, shaping the future of Web3 gaming in the Middle East.
main_desc1: Level up your game and redefine victory. Join us on the journey to extraordinary gaming experiences and unparalleled e-sport achievements.
hero_title0: Web3 & Gaming Unite: Elevate Middle East Gaming
hero_title: AI DRIVEN GAMEFI GOVERNED BY YOU
hero_desc1: We are not looking to reinvent the wheel of Gamification and game plots - just to give you the power and ownership over what you have already been doing for years.
hero_desc2: Our goal is to put fun back into GameFi and make the Metaverse experience accessible to any user with a mobile device from any corner of the world.
jurisdiction: Your Jurisdiction May Not Regulate Cryptocurrencies. The Value Of Cryptocurrencies May Rise And Fall. Profits May Be Subject To Capital Gains Taxes Or Other Local Taxes.

zombie.title: You Have to Survive
zombie.desc: Dive into 'Curse Of The Pharaoh' a groundbreaking hybrid FPS whereancient mythology and futuristic warfare collide in the heart of a reimaginedDubai. As ancient plagues awaken, transforming the city into a nexus of mythologicalresurgence, you're thrust into a world where your shooting skills are just ascrucial as the alliances you form and the strategies you devise.
zombie.overview: Curse Of The Pharaoh combines the fast-paced action of FPS games with the mystery of ancient mythology, all set in a futuristic Dubai landscape. Inspired by the intense cooperative gameplay of Left 4 Dead 2, navigate through ancient curses and futuristic challenges in this adrenaline-fueled adventure. Dive into Curse Of The Pharaoh
details2: Blend of FPS action and ancient mythology
Set in a beautifully reimagined Dubai
Blockchain Integration: Unlock and trade powerful artifacts as NFTs, each with unique abilities and lore, enhancing your gameplay and collection.

lucid.title: Craft tools, create blocks
lucid.desc: Welcome to "Cryptocraft," aboundless universe where your imagination is the only limit. Dive into anopen-world sandbox experience that combines the joy of building and survivalwith the innovative features of Web3 and NFTs. In Lucidcraft, every creation,every exploration, and every interaction enriches your journey and the worldaround you.
lucid.overview: Embark on an adventure in ever-expanding worlds, craft your destiny, and become part of a vibrant community where collaboration and creativity reign supreme.
lucid.prop_audience: Target Audience: Creative builders, explorers, Web3 enthusiasts, and community-driven players
lucid.overview2: Lucidcraft is an amalgamation of creativity, survival, and exploration, set in a richly diverse and responsive world.
lucid.build: Building and Crafting: From humble shelters to grandiose constructions, Lucidcraft's intuitive crafting system invites endless innovation
lucid.exploration: Exploration: Traverse sprawling biomes, each brimming with unique resources and mysteries. Discover, adapt, and survive in a world that's as vast as your imagination
points: Dynamic, User-Generated Worlds: Step into infinite realms shaped by players. Your creations contribute to the ever-evolving tapestry of Lucidcraft's universe.
Web3 Integration: Experience true ownership with blockchain-powered in-game assets. Trade, own, and monetize your creations and real estate as NFTs, adding a layer of investment to your gameplay.
Evolving Ecosystems: Interact with living environments where your actions influence the world. From altering landscapes to affecting local wildlife, your impact is tangible.
Customizable Gameplay: Tailor your Lucidcraft experience with extensive modding tools and in-game programming, creating unique game modes and personalizing your adventures.
Community Governance: Have a say in thedevelopment and future of Lucidcraft through a decentralized autonomousorganization (DAO), empowering the community to steer the game's evolution.

battle.title: Team up, win a deathmatch
battle.desc: Battlefury is a game for emphasizing strategy, cooperation, and quick reflexes. You can choose one of four character and team up with other players in a deathmatch, free for all, and capture flag game mode.
battle.overview: Game emphasizing strategy, cooperation, and quick reflexes. Account and Session Creation Players need an Epic Games account to play. Create game sessions for multiplayer, prioritizing player count and ping.

overview_data.title: Character Assignment
overview_data.value: Four characters to choose from, each with unique characteristics.

overview_data.title: Game Modes
overview_data.value: Team Deathmatch, Free For All, Capture Flag, with varying bot numbers.

overview_data.title: Weapons
overview_data.value: Different weapon sets for each match.

details.title: Audience
details.value: Gamers 15 and older who enjoy competitive FPS games

details.title: Game modes
details.value: Team Deathmatch, Free For All, Capture Flag

details2: Requires signing in with an Epic Games account.
Bots included (varying numbers based on game mode).
Different sets of weapons for each match.

canyon.title:
Experience
Sandstorm Racer
canyon.desc: Feel the thrill of Sandstorm Racer, where high-octane racing meets the challenge of navigating through treacherous sandstorms. Drawing inspiration from titles like Forza Horizon, this game offers a perfect blend of realistic racing dynamics and accessible, fun gameplay.
gameFeaturesDetail: Realistic physics engine for authentic vehicle handling
Dynamic weather effects, including signature sandstorms
Blockchain Integration: Compete in races, earn unique NFT rewards, and customize your vehicles with tradable assets that showcase your achievements.

desertWarior.fpsGame:
A new era of fps
gaming
desertWarior.fpsGameTitle: Welcome to "Desert Warriors," where the thrill of first-person shootersmeets the groundbreaking possibilities of Web3 and NFTs. Set against the backdrop of vast and diverse desert landscapes, this game invites you into a world of strategic combat, team-based challenges, and a vibrant player-driveneconomy. Here, every decision, every battle, and every alliance holds theweight of your legacy.
desertWarior.ExploreDesertTitle: Welcome to Desert Warriors, where the thrill of first-person shooters meets the groundbreaking possibilities of Web3 and NFTs. Set against the backdrop of vast and diverse desert landscapes, this game invites you into a world of strategic combat, team-based challenges, and a vibrant player-driven economy. Here, every decision, every battle, and every alliance holds the weight of your legacy.
desertWarior.DesertGameOverviewTitle: Desert Warriors is a cutting-edge first-person shooter set in a vast desert landscape, where tactical gameplay meets the innovation of Web3 and NFTs. Engage in intense strategic combat and team-based challenges, all while navigating a player-driven economy enabled by blockchain technology.
desertWarior.prop_audience: Target Audience: Competitive and casual gamers, Web3 enthusiasts
desertWarior.prop_desc: Dive into "Desert Warriors" where your strategic prowess,teamwork, and adaptability are your greatest assets. Engage in high-stakes combat across ancient ruins, futuristic installations, and unpredictable sanddunes.
points: Strategic Gameplay: Every match in "Desert Warriors" is a testament to strategy, requiring keen planning, flawless team coordination, and adept skill execution.
Web3 Integration: Propel your gaming experience into the future with blockchain technology, enabling true ownership, trading, and customization of NFT-based in-game assets.
Diverse Environments: From the silent whispers of ancient deserts to the cold echoes of advanced military bases, each map offers unique tactical challenges.
Community-Centric Development: "Desert Warriors" evolves with you. Your feedback and engagement shape the future, with continuous updates and new content driven by the community.
desertWarior.title: Game Featues
desertWarior.desc: "Desert Warrios" is more than an FPS; it's a test of tactics and teamwork. Navigate through challenging terrains, leverage cover, and synchronize with your squad to dominate the battlefield.
Featuesdetails: Core Mechanics: Immerse yourself in a variety of actions including sprinting for cover, precision aiming, and deploying strategic equipment, all designed to encourage thoughtful, tactical gameplay.
Game Modes: Whether you prefer the intensity of 1v1 duels, the strategic depth of 2v2 skirmishes, or the classic teamwork of 5v5 battles, "Desert Warriors" has a mode for every warrior.
points: Strategic Gameplay: Every match in "Desert Warriors" is a testament to strategy, requiring keen planning, flawless team coordination, and adept skill execution.
Web3 Integration: Propel your gaming experience into the future with blockchain technology, enabling true ownership, trading, and customization of NFT-based in-game assets.
Diverse Environments: From the silent whispers of ancient deserts to the cold echoes of advanced military bases, each map offers unique tactical challenges.
Community-Centric Development: "Desert Warriors" evolves with you. Your feedback and engagement shape the future, with continuous updates and new content driven by the community.

games_content.description: Zombie Outbreak is an action/adventure/survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Collect weapon, bullet, and fuel props. Travel through open-world environment with different biomes.

games_content.title: lucidcraft
games_content.description: Lucidcraft is a sandbox adventure survival game set in a procedurally generated world. You can craft tools like pickaxe, axe, and shovle. Create a block and gather all the recourses as much as you need.

games_content.title: battlefury
games_content.description: Battlefury is a game for emphasizing strategy, cooperation, and quick reflexes. You can choose one of four character and team up with other players in a deathmatch, free for all, and capture flag game mode.

games_content.title: Canyon Drift
games_content.description: Canyon Drift is a race game that bring players to race on looped track with canyon-style environtment. You can choose one car in the showroom as your car and race with other players.

about_data.title: Our Journey
about_data.value: Lucidia was founded with a revolutionary intent: to redefine the landscape of gaming in the Middle East and usher it into the Web3 era. Our journey began as a modest development studio, and we have since evolved into a pioneering game publisher with a unique focus on community-driven governance. Utilizing the robust capabilities of blockchain technology, we introduced LUCID tokens and gameplay-based NFTs to enable direct participation of both players and developers in our ecosystem.

about_data.title: Our Vision
about_data.value: We envision a gaming world where players are not just consumers but active contributors to the gaming experience. Our Web3 platform provides a decentralized, transparent, and inclusive arena that transcends traditional gaming paradigms. By becoming the first Web3 game studio publisher in the Middle East, we aim to accelerate the adoption of blockchain technology in gaming, enrich the quality of content, and expand the possibilities of true ownership and participative decision-making.

mission_data.normal: To grant players and developers significant decision-making power through tokenomics and governance models, ensuring games are built and improved by the very people who play and love them.
To bring more game developers into the decentralized space, offering them the tools, resources, and freedom to create, innovate, and succeed.
To continually push the boundaries of what's possible in Web3 gaming by developing and publishing high-quality, engaging titles that can be improved upon collaboratively.
To level the playing field, removing traditional barriers to entry and granting opportunities for creators and players alike, particularly in the underrepresented Middle East region.
To create a self-sustaining loop of development and improvement, financed and directed by community governance and tokenomics, ensuring long-term viability.

team.meet_desc: At Lucidia we believe that the true, fully immersive metaverse is just around the corner.

products.title: Marketplace for Middle-Eastern Developers
products.desc: A culturally tailored marketplace fostering collaboration among developers in the Middle East.

products.title: Marketplace for In-Game Assets and Code
products.desc: A hub for trading game assets and code, enhancing resource sharing among developers.

products.title: Comprehensive NFT Integration Toolkit
products.desc: Tools simplifying NFT integration into games, bridging creativity and blockchain technology.

products.title: Built-in Game Inventory System
products.desc: A seamless solution for managing in-game inventories and integrating them with NFT marketplaces.

products.title: NFT Marketplace as a Service for Game Studios
products.desc: Customizable NFT marketplace solutions enabling studios to launch their own branded platforms.

products.title: Marketplace for User Account Sharing - Scholarship Program
products.desc: A platform facilitating account sharing and scholarship programs, promoting accessibility and community engagement.

products.title: Game Incubator and Accelerator Program
products.desc: Boost Web3 game projects with mentorship and resources for rapid development and market launch.

products.title: Quarterly Top 10 Games Rangking
products.desc: Highlight the top Web3 games in the Middle East based on engagement and innovation, offering them exclusive opportunities.

products.title: Share DAO Tools for Enhanced User Participation
products.desc: Engage the community in decision-making with DAO tools, promoting a sense of ownership and involvement.

products.title: Seamless Login System with Social Media Integration
products.desc: Introduce a rewarding play-to-earn model, allowing studios to create games that offer tangible rewards.

products.title: Game Incubator and Accelerator Program
products.desc: Enable smooth in-game transactions with a versatile token system, fully integrated for a seamless buying experience.

products.title: Cross-Platform Compatibility with Unified Lucidia Login
products.desc: Ensure gamers can seamlessly switch between platforms without hassle, thanks to a unified login system.

products.title: Community Building and Engagement through Lucidia's Reward System
products.desc: Enhance competitive play with a robust tournament API, featuring an ELO ranking, bracket systems, and automated smart contracts.

products.title: Play to Earn Framework for Game Studios
products.desc: Introduce a rewarding play-to-earn model, allowing studios to create games that offer tangible rewards.

products.title: NFT Smart Contract Creation with Templates via Admin Control Panel
products.desc: Streamline NFT creation with easy-to-use smart contract templates accessible through a comprehensive admin panel.

products.title: Enhanced Blockchain Analytics Dashboard with In-App Event Tracking
products.desc: Gain insights with an advanced analytics dashboard, offering in-depth tracking of in-app events and blockchain transactions.

products.title: Tournament API with ELO and Bracket System and Smart Contract Automation
products.desc: Enhance competitive play with a robust tournament API, featuring an ELO ranking, bracket systems, and automated smart contracts.

products.title: User Education Portal for Web3 Gaming
products.desc: Empower users with knowledge through an education portal dedicated to Web3 gaming concepts and practices.

products.title: Web3 Game Marketing Hub
products.desc: Amplify game visibility with a dedicated marketing hub, designed to promote Web3 games across various channels.

products.title: Cross-Game Asset Integration for an Interconnected Gaming Universe
products.desc: Create a unified gaming experience with cross-game asset integration, allowing for a seamless player journey across titles.

products.title: Community-Driven Funding Platform for Web3 Game Development
products.desc: Support game development through a community-driven funding platform, encouraging collaboration and innovation.

products.title: Comprehensive Translation Product for English to Arabic Localization
products.desc: Bridge language barriers with a comprehensive translation tool, tailored for English to Arabic game localization.

products.title: Offline Events Organizer in the Middle East for Community Engagement
products.desc: Strengthen the gaming community with offline events organized across the Middle East, fostering real-world connections.

products.title: Lucidia Bug Bounty Reward System
products.desc: Encourage community participation in game improvement with a bug bounty system, rewarding contributions to game integrity.

our_product.title: Welcome to Lucidia's Ecosystem
our_product.description: Explore our suite of innovative products designed for the vibrant Middle Eastern gaming community. From unique marketplaces to advanced NFT tools, Lucidia is your gateway to the future of gaming.
our_product.join-content: Ready to transform your gaming experience? Connect, Create, and Trade in the Middle East's premier gaming ecosystem.

career.title: Join Us As Lucidian
career.culture_content: Emphasize Lucidia's collaborative culture, commitment to innovation, and benefits like remote work options, continuous learning opportunities, and participation in groundbreaking projects.
career.the_feeling_work_with_us:
The Feelings
When They Worked With Us
career.raphael_content: As the Lead of web developers, steering the ship of innovation, I've found unparalleled support working with Lucidia. Their commitment to excellence in both front-end and back-end development has allowed us to break through barriers and reach new heights. The synergy between our visions and their technical prowess is nothing short of extraordinary. Together, we're crafting the future of digital landscapes.
career.meera_content: Joining Lucidia as a Front-end Developer has been a game-changer for me. The creative freedom and collaborative spirit here are invigorating. Working on cutting-edge projects, I've seen my ideas come to life, making every line of code a masterpiece. It's not just a job; it's a front-row seat to the evolution of web development. Proud to be part of a team that turns visions into breathtaking realities.
career.journey_content: We're on the lookout for dynamic individuals with a passion for gaming and a flair for the crypto world to join our innovative team, no matter where you from.

curse_game.prop_title: Title: Curse Of The Pharaoh
curse_game.prop_genre: Genre: Hybrid FPS with Co-op PvP, and PvE Elements
curse_game.prop_setting:
Setting: A post-apocalyptic Dubai, where ancient Middle Eastern mythshave taken root in the modern world.
Embark on a quest through a cityscape that marries the iconic skyline ofDubai with the haunting beauty of mythological chaos, where every corner turnedis a step deeper into a narrative that spans ages.
curse_game.dubai_reimagined: Dubai Reimagined: Traverse the sands of time in a Dubai overtaken by mythological forces, where every landmark tells a story of ancient power and modern resilience.
curse_game.mythological: Mythological Warfare: Engage in combat against legendary beasts and deities from Middle Eastern lore, utilizing a mix of futuristic firepower and ancient magic.
curse_game.narrative: Narrative Depth: Delve into a story that weaves the rich cultural tapestry of the Middle East with thrilling mythological tales, setting the stage for an epic saga of heroism and betrayal.
curse_game.web3_integration: Web3 Integration: Step into the future of gaming with Web3 technologies, where your achievements and treasures become NFTs, adding a layer of strategy and value to every action.
curse_game.mechanics_desc: 'Curse Of The Pharaoh' offers a rich blend of FPS action, strategy,and cooperative gameplay, set against the backdrop of an open-world Dubai afflicted by ancient curses.
curse_game.advanced_movement: Advanced Movement: Master the art of urban navigation with parkour mechanics, allowing for fluid movement across Dubai's transformed skyline.
curse_game.strategic_combat: Strategic Combat: Balance your arsenal of high-tech weapons with enchanted artifacts, each offering unique advantages against the mythological menaces you'll face.
curse_game.cooperative_mission: Cooperative Missions Band together with allies to undertake quests that dive deep into the heart of the plagues, with dynamic scenarios that adapt based on your team's decisions and achievements.
curse_game.stroy_narrative_desc: In a world where the past and future collide, you play a crucial role inunraveling the mysteries behind the relic that has bridged the gap betweenrealms, setting ancient gods and monsters loose upon Dubai.
curse_game.technical_framework_content: Powered by Unreal Engine 5, 'Pharaoh's Plague' brings themyth-infused world of Dubai to life with stunning visuals, complex AIbehaviors, and seamless multiplayer experiences, all underpinned by Ethereumblockchain technology for a new era of digital ownership and in-game economies.
curse_game.join_battle_content:
Are you ready to step into a world where myths walk among us, and thebattleground is the city of the future? 'Curse Of The Pharaoh' awaits,where your courage, strategy, and alliances will determine the fate of Dubaiand the balance between the ancient and the modern.

Embark on Your Journey in Curse Of The Pharaoh

privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy and Terms
privacy_page.desc: This privacy policy ("Policy") describes how our website (the "Website") collects, uses, and protects the personal information of our users. By accessing or using the Website, you agree to be bound by this Policy. If you do not agree to this Policy, please do not use the Website.

privacy_data.title: Information We Collect
privacy_data.value: We may collect personal information from you when you use the Website, including your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide. We may also collect information about your use of the Website, such as the pages you visit and the actions you take.

privacy_data.title: Use of Information
privacy_data.value: We may use the information we collect to operate and improve the Website, to personalize your experience, and to communicate with you. We may also use the information for research and analysis, to prevent fraud or illegal activities, and as required by law.

privacy_data.title: Sharing of Information
privacy_data.value: We may share your personal information with third parties for the purpose of providing the Website and its features, such as hosting, payment processing, and customer support. We may also share your information with third parties for research and analysis, or as required by law.

privacy_data.title: Security
privacy_data.value: We take reasonable measures to protect the personal information we collect from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no data transmission over the internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. As a result, while we strive to protect your personal information, we cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information you transmit to us, and you do so at your own risk.

privacy_data.title: Retention of Information
privacy_data.value: We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide the Website and its features, or as required by law.

privacy_data.title: Changes to Policy
privacy_data.value: We reserve the right to make changes to this Policy at any time. Your continued use of the Website following any changes to this Policy will be deemed acceptance of those changes.

terms_data.title: Introduction
terms_data.value: Welcome to Lucidia website. By accessing or using the Website, you agree to be bound by these terms of use (the "Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Website.

terms_data.title: User Conduct
terms_data.value: You agree to use the Website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the Website. Prohibited behavior includes, but is not limited to, harassment, hate speech, and discrimination.

terms_data.title: User-Generated Content
terms_data.value: The Website may allow users to upload, post, or transmit content, including text, images, and video (collectively, "User Content"). By uploading, posting, or transmitting User Content, you represent and warrant that you have the right to do so and that such User Content does not infringe any intellectual property rights or other rights of any third party. You also agree that any User Content you upload, post, or transmit may be used, modified, and shared by us and other users of the Website

terms_data.title: Intelectual Party
terms_data.value: The Website and its content are protected by intellectual property laws. You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell or exploit any portion of the Website without our express written permission.

terms_data.title: Third Party Links
terms_data.value: The Website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content or practices of any third-party website, and you access any such third-party website at your own risk.

terms_data.title: Disclaimer
terms_data.value: The Website is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, as to the operation of the Website or the information, content, materials, or products included on the Website.

terms_data.title: Limitation of Liability
terms_data.value: In no event shall we be liable for any damages whatsoever, including but not limited to any direct, indirect, special, consequential, punitive or incidental damages, or damages for loss of use, profits, data or other intangibles, or the cost of procurement of substitute goods and services, arising out of or related to the use, inability to use, unauthorized access to or use, or misuse of the Website, or any other claim related in any way to your use of the Website, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

terms_data.title: Changes to Terms
terms_data.value: We reserve the right to make changes to these Terms at any time. Your continued use of the Website following any changes to these Terms will be deemed acceptance of those changes.

terms_data.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
terms_data.value: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the Website is operated, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law.

games_page.section1_description: Cross-Platform Compatibility: A Game Changer Introduces the Cross-Platform Compatibility feature, explaining how it allows for a unified gaming experience across multiple titles within the Lucidia ecosystem through a single Lucidia account. This system is integrated with popular social media platforms for ease of access, ensuring a seamless login process for users.
section2_description: Wider Audience Reach: Highlight how joining Lucidia provides games with instant exposure to over 30,000 users, addressing the challenge of attracting players that many Web3 games face.

Enhanced Player Experience: Explain how the unified login and cross-platform compatibility enhance the user experience, making it easier for players to explore and engage with multiple games within the Lucidia ecosystem.
Community Engagement: Emphasize the active and growing community within Lucidia, providing developers with a direct line to feedback, support, and engagement from a dedicated user base.

Innovative Features: Detail additional benefits such as access to Lucidia's NFT Integration Toolkit, marketplaces, and community-driven platforms, which can enrich games with new monetization strategies and engagement mechanisms.
games_page.before_join_description: Create a form by submit your studio name, your email, your website or twitter (optional), and the description of your game.
games_page.after_join_description: Our team will be in contact with you as soon as possible.

buy.recommend: We recommend using MetaMask on desktop for a smoother experience, or Trust Wallet on mobile.
buy.click: Click the "Connect Wallet" button in the top right corner and log in using your preferred wallet. Make sure you have a browser extension wallet like
buy.installed: installed on your desktop or use a supported mobile wallet like

step2.title: Option 1: Buy ETH or BNB with a Card
value: Go to https://moonpay.com/buy and purchase ETH or BNB using your card. The purchased ETH or BNB will be sent to your wallet. It is recommended to buy a minimum of $20 worth of ETH or $5 worth of BNB to cover the minimum purchase of $LUCID tokens.
Enter the amount you wish to invest
Choose your bonus option - it will be available one month after TGE

step2.title: Option 2: Buy $LUCID with ETH or BNB
value: Ensure you have enough ETH or BNB in your wallet (if not, refer to option 1). Enter the amount of $LUCID you want to purchase (minimum $15) and click Buy with ETH or Buy with BNB. Confirm the transaction in your wallet and review the gas cost
Enter the amount you wish to invest
Choose your bonus option - it will be available one month after TGE

step2.title: Option 3: Buy $LUCID with USDT
value: Make sure you have at least $20 worth of USDT in your wallet.
Enter the amount you wish to invest
Choose your bonus option - it will be available one month after TGE
You will need to approve the purchase twice. The first approval is for the USDT contract, and the second is for the transaction amount. Complete both approval steps to finalize the transaction.

step3: Enter your Telegram username to receive an additional 5% bonus for each user you refer. A referral link will be generated after this step.
Copy your referral link from the bottom of the page, and you're all set!

default.title: Explore Diverse Games within Lucidia's Web3 Ecosystem
default.desc: Join Lucidia and expand your game's reach across a vibrant Web3 ecosystem, featuring cross-platform compatibility and a unified gaming experience. Benefit from wider audience reach, enhanced player experiences, and innovative features for game developers.

games.title: Explore Diverse Games within Lucidia's Web3 Ecosystem
games.desc: Join Lucidia and expand your game's reach across a vibrant Web3 ecosystem, featuring cross-platform compatibility and a unified gaming experience. Benefit from wider audience reach, enhanced player experiences, and innovative features for game developers.

sandstorm.title: Sandstorm Racing - Master Desert Drifts in an Epic Racing Adventure
sandstorm.desc: Dive into 'Sandstorm Racing', an open-world racing simulation set in the stunning deserts of the Middle East. Experience the thrill of Arab drift racing, extensive vehicle customization, and dynamic sandstorm environments.

desert.title: Desert Dominion - Strategic FPS Gaming with Web3 Integration
desert.desc: Embark on an epic journey with 'Desert Dominion', a first-person shooter blending strategic gameplay, team-based challenges, and a player-driven economy with the innovative use of Web3 and NFTs in vast desert landscapes.

curse.title: Pharaoh's Plague - Mythological FPS Adventure in a Futuristic Dubai
curse.desc: Step into 'Pharaoh's Plague,' an FPS that blends ancient mythology with futuristic warfare in Dubai. Encounter legendary beasts, utilize advanced weaponry mixed with magic, and immerse in a narrative-rich setting with Web3 integration.

ecosystem_home.title: Lucidia Ecosystem - Unleash Gaming Innovation in the Middle East
ecosystem_home.desc: Dive into Lucidia's ecosystem app, your gateway to a world where traditional gaming meets blockchain innovation. Explore a suite of tools from NFT Marketplace to Web3 Wallet Login solution, designed for gamers and developers in the Middle East.

ecosystem_games.title: Explore a World of Gaming with Lucidia - A Universe of Diverse Titles
ecosystem_games.desc: Discover the vast and vibrant universe of games within Lucidia's ecosystem. From action-packed adventures and strategic battles to immersive narratives, each game is a gateway to innovative, blockchain-enhanced gaming experiences.

ecosystem_tournaments.title: Lucidia Tournaments - Compete in the Ultimate Gaming Arena
ecosystem_tournaments.desc: Enter the competitive world of Lucidia's gaming tournaments. With a variety of games and styles, from strategic duels to high-energy clashes, there's a challenge for every gamer. Compete for glory and crypto prizes in the dynamic Lucidia ecosystem.

ecosystem_marketplace.title: Lucidia Marketplace - Innovate and Trade in the Gaming Community
ecosystem_marketplace.desc: Discover Lucidia's Marketplace, a platform redefining collaboration and trade within the Middle Eastern gaming community. From unique in-game assets and code to comprehensive NFT integration tools, find everything you need to bring your gaming projects to life.

ecosystem_devtools.title: Lucidia Developer Tools - Empower Your Game Development Journey
ecosystem_devtools.desc: Unlock your game development potential with Lucidia's suite of tools, from NFT integration kits to Web3 wallet login solutions. Each tool is designed to enhance your projects and bring your creative visions to life in the Web3 gaming space.

ecosystem_educational.title: Web3 Gaming Education Portal by Lucidia - Learn, Grow, Innovate
ecosystem_educational.desc: Join Lucidia's Web3 Gaming Education Portal, your gateway to mastering Web3 gaming. With tutorials, articles, and videos coming soon, get ready to explore and understand the future of gaming.

ecosystem_dao.title: Lucidia DAO Voting - Influence the Future of Your Favorite Games
ecosystem_dao.desc: Participate in shaping the future of gaming within the Lucidia ecosystem. Cast your vote on game decisions and be an integral part of the game development story through our DAO Voting platform.

ecosystem_FPS.title: Desert Dominion - Tactical FPS with Web3 Integration | Lucidia
ecosystem_FPS.desc: Join 'Desert Dominion' on Lucidia, an FPS where strategic gameplay meets Web3. Explore vast deserts, engage in team-based battles, and own unique NFT assets. Start your adventure today.

ecosystem_drift.title: Sandstorm Racing - Open-World Racing in a Dynamic Desert Landscape
ecosystem_drift.desc: Experience 'Sandstorm Racing' in Lucidia, where thrilling Arab drift racing meets dynamic sandstorm environments. Customize your vehicle and explore Middle Eastern car culture in this immersive racing simulation.

ecosystem_zombie.title: Pharaoh's Plague - Mythology Meets FPS in Futuristic Dubai
ecosystem_zombie.desc: Dive into 'Pharaoh's Plague,' a unique blend of FPS action and ancient mythology set in a reimagined Dubai. Experience strategic combat, mythological beasts, and Web3 integration in this immersive game world.

ecosystem_craft.title: Lucidcraft - Unleash Creativity in a Sandbox World with Web3
ecosystem_craft.desc: Enter 'Lucidcraft', a sandbox game where creativity knows no bounds. Build, explore, and trade in a dynamic world enhanced by Web3 technology. Shape your adventure and own your creations.

home.title: Lucidia - Revolutionizing Middle Eastern Gaming with Web3 Innovations
home.desc: Lucidia is transforming the gaming landscape in the Middle East by integrating the immersive world of traditional gaming with cutting-edge Web3 technologies. Explore our unique ecosystem designed for developers and gamers to experience the future of gaming.

team.title: Meet the Lucidia Team - Innovators Behind Middle Eastern Web3 Gaming
team.desc: Discover the passionate professionals at Lucidia driving the fusion of traditional gaming with Web3 in the Middle East. Learn about our mission, culture, and the visionary leadership shaping the future of gaming.

vision.title: Our Vision - Shaping the Future of Gaming with Web3 | Lucidia
vision.desc: At Lucidia, we're committed to redefining the Middle Eastern gaming landscape through Web3 technologies, offering a unique ecosystem for developers and players to engage in innovative gaming experiences.

products.title: Lucidia Ecosystem - Elevate Your Game Development with Cutting-Edge Web3 Tools
products.desc: Dive into Lucidia's ecosystem, offering a rich portfolio of Web3 products designed to empower developers. From specialized NFT toolkits to robust wallet login system, we provide the tools you need to innovate in the Middle Eastern gaming landscape.

road_map.title: Lucidia Roadmap - Charting the Future of Web3 Gaming Development
road_map.desc: Explore Lucidia's roadmap, detailing our strategic journey from launching innovative marketplaces to implementing advanced wallet login systems, paving the way for groundbreaking development in the Web3 gaming sector.

career.title: Join Lucidia - Careers in Web3 Gaming Innovation
career.desc: Lucidia is hiring! Explore open positions from Blockchain Developer to UI/UX Designer and become part of a team shaping the future of Web3 gaming. Enjoy a culture of collaboration, innovation, and benefits like remote work and continuous learning.
